title: Madmenah
html: MADMENAH(Mad·meʹnah) [from a root meaning “manure”].A site in the path of the Assyrian advance toward Jerusalem. (Isa 10:24, 31, 32) Today Madmenah’s exact location is unknown. But some tentatively identify it with Shuʽfat, about 4 km (2.5 mi) NNW of the Temple Mount in Jerusalem.
